com.faltro.houdoku.util

Class PluginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.faltro.houdoku.util.PluginManager

  • public class PluginManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager and container for client plugins, which currently solely consists of content sources. Generally, the instance of this class primarily exists to hold and provide access to instances of the available plugins so that multiple plugin instances are not necessary.

        public PluginManager()
        Create the PluginManager.
